DESCRIPTION: Upon playing a #yFire card, increase your #yFire #yAffinity by the amount of the cost of the card played.
Upon reaching enough #yFire #yAffinity become #yHeated. Your #yFire #yAffinity is reset upon playing an #yIce card or at the start of your next turn.
Upon playing an #yIce card, increase your #yIce #yAffinity by the amount of the cost of the card played.
Upon reaching enough #yIce #yAffinity become #yChilled. Your #yIce #yAffinity is reset upon playing a #yFire card or at the start of your next turn.
You can no longer gain #yFire #yAffinity / #yIce #yAffinity or become #yHeated / #yChilled.
Gain #yStrength equal to the amount of #yFire #yAffinity you have. Your #yFire attacks also apply the same amount of #yAblaze.
Gain #yDexterity equal to the amount of #yIce #yAffinity you have. Whenever you fully #yBlock an attack, apply the same amount of #yFrozen.

Clicking on this card in the #yDraw #yPile will put it in your hand. This card then becomes #yEthereal and #yExhaust
Start each combat with this card in your discard pile.
